Better Technology, Happier Patients.

Salucro is a Healthcare Technology Company, Exclusively Focused on Patient Payments.

Based in Phoenix, Arizona, we serve over 900+ organizations both in the US and internationally. We are passionate about delivering payment technology to the healthcare market, including hospitals, health systems, physician practices, ancillary service providers, along with other revenue cycle service and technology companies.
